data.title: Xbox Games developed by Petroglyph Games
data.meta_description: Compare Xbox scores for all the games developed by Petroglyph Games. Register now to see yours!
data.text:
Xbox Countdown Sale 2020 Roundup

Over 700 prices slashed across Xbox and PC games and add-ons in Microsoft's epic end-of-year sale. Whatever you like to play, you're sure to find some unmissable deals here...

Posted 4 years ago by Jack Watling

Xbox One Sale Roundup: December 15th, 2020

Discounts on Trials Fusion, Watch_Dogs, Flockers, The Crew, Beyond Eyes, Assassin's Creed Syndicate, WRC 5 and more

Posted 4 years ago by Jack Watling

The Xbox Black Friday 2020 sale is now live with huge discounts on hundreds of games

Discounts on Need for Speed Rivals, Killer Instinct, Ryse: Son of Rome, Battlefield 4, Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag, Killer Instinct Classic, Tomb Raider - Definitive Edition and more

Posted 4 years ago by Sean Carey

Xbox One Sale Roundup: October 13th, 2020

Discounts on Strider, Wolfenstein: The New Order, Far Cry 4, Terraria, Grand Theft Auto V, MONOPOLY Plus, MONOPOLY Deal and more

Posted 4 years ago by Jack Watling

Xbox One Sale Roundup: September 29th, 2020

Discounts on Watch_Dogs, Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Director's Cut, Borderlands 2, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, Squid Hero for Kinect, Submerged, Nightmares from the Deep: The Cursed Heart and more

Posted 4 years ago by Jack Watling
